item.title: mariadb
item.description:
Description

MariaDB is an open source, community-developed SQL database server that is widely in use around the world due to its enterprise features, flexibility, and collaboration with leading tech firms.

  • https://github.com/bitnami/charts/tree/main/bitnami/mariadb

🔑 Permissions (8)

Role Resource Verbs Risk Tags

item.title: metrics-server
item.description:
Description

Metrics Server aggregates resource usage data, such as container CPU and memory usage, in a Kubernetes cluster and makes it available via the Metrics API.

  • https://github.com/bitnami/charts/tree/main/bitnami/metrics-server

Overview

Role Resource Verbs Risk Tags

ClusterRole metrics-server-default core/pods get · list · watch Low

item.title: minio
item.description:
Description

MinIO(R) is an object storage server, compatible with Amazon S3 cloud storage service, mainly used for storing unstructured data (such as photos, videos, log files, etc.).
